results.title: Metformin enhances antitumor action of sodium dichloroacetate against glioma C6.

results.title: Influence of metformin, sodium dichloroacetate and their combination on the hematological and biochemical blood parameters of rats with gliomas C6.
results.text_hl: AIM: To investigate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@, @CHEMICAL_Dichloroacetic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003999 @@@DCA@@@ and their combination on the survival of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Complement_Component_6_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567307 @@@C6 glioma@@@ and major haematological and biochemical blood parameters.
